item.title: Michael add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Do you wish me a good morning, or mean that it is a good morning whether I want it or not; or that you feel good this morning; or that it is a morning to be good on?" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Michael add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Where did you go to, if I may ask?' said Thorin to Gandalf as they rode along. To look ahead,' said he. And what brought you back in the nick of time?' Looking behind,' said he." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Michael add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "There is more in you of good than you know, child of the kindly West. Some courage and some wisdom, blended in measure. If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Michael add a quote by Joanna Kavenna
item.description: "The following morning she realised they hated her. That hurt her feelings; she always preferred her hatred to be unreciprocated." -- Joanna Kavenna
